# Auto-generated for Keep PHASE_EIGHT.md synced with features-phase8.json
def keep_phase_eight_md_synced_with(json_file="features-phase8.json", output_md="docs/PHASE_EIGHT.md"):
    """Regenerate PHASE_EIGHT.md based on features-phase8.json."""
    import json, os
    if not os.path.exists(json_file):
        return False
    with open(json_file, "r") as f:
        data = json.load(f)
    lines = ["# Phase Eight Tasks", "", "## Tier Features"]
    tiers = data.get("tierFeatures", {})
    for tier, feats in tiers.items():
        lines.append(f"- **{tier}**")
        for feat in feats[:5]:
            lines.append(f"  - {feat}")
    with open(output_md, "w") as md:
        md.write("\n".join(lines) + "\n")
    return True
